com.groundcontrol.game.model.elements

Class ElementModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.groundcontrol.game.model.elements.ElementModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CometModel, ExplosionModel, PlanetModel, PlayerModel

    public abstract class ElementModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract element model. Represents all the elements in our model
